Elaina:WanderingWitch.NAME: Wandering Witch
Elaina:WanderingWitch.FLAVOR: A record of the travels and observations of the beautiful witch
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, #yRecord a card according to #yMonth. At the end of your turn, #yRecord the last card played this turn. NL Advance #Month by 1 when entering a new room. Upon completing a cycle, gain 50 Gold.

At the start of each battle, #yRecord a card according to #yMonth. At the end of your turn, #yRecord the last card played this turn. NL Advance #Month by 1 when entering a new room. Upon completing a cycle, gain 50 Gold. NL Current season: #bWinter

At the start of each battle, #yRecord a card according to #yMonth. At the end of your turn, #yRecord the last card played this turn. NL Advance #Month by 1 when entering a new room. Upon completing a cycle, gain 50 Gold. NL Current season: #gSpring

At the start of each battle, #yRecord a card according to #yMonth. At the end of your turn, #yRecord the last card played this turn. NL Advance #Month by 1 when entering a new room. Upon completing a cycle, gain 50 Gold. NL Current season: #rSummer

At the start of each battle, #yRecord a card according to #yMonth. At the end of your turn, #yRecord the last card played this turn. NL Advance #Month by 1 when entering a new room. Upon completing a cycle, gain 50 Gold. NL Current season: #yAutumn

Elaina:PortableWand.NAME: Portable Wand
Elaina:PortableWand.FLAVOR: Ideal for the witch's nimble hands.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, activate an additional #yInstant effect.

Elaina:StoveFire.NAME: Stove Fire
Elaina:StoveFire.FLAVOR: Burning steadfastly amidst the wind and snow
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply ALL enemies 3 #yMagic #yResidue.

Elaina:TimeEngraving.NAME: Time Engraving
Elaina:TimeEngraving.FLAVOR: Time reveals all, and time buries all
DESCRIPTIONS: When #yMonth is regressed, #yMonth is advanced by 1. NL When #yMonth is advanced, gain [E].

Elaina:AssociationEmblem.NAME: Association Emblem
Elaina:AssociationEmblem.FLAVOR: A brooch symbolizing the bright moon, belonging to the Magic Integration Association
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, evenly distribute all creatures' #yStrength bonuses.

Elaina:WitchBracelet.NAME: Witch Bracelet
Elaina:WitchBracelet.FLAVOR: A brooch symbolizing the stars belongs to witches in general - but this one, belongs to the lovely Miss Elaina
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 2 #ySpell #yBoost when playing a Skill.

Elaina:InscriptedRuins.NAME: Inscribed Ruins
Elaina:InscriptedRuins.FLAVOR: A fragment of a wall, inscribed with the name of Elaina by an unknown witch
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card that will be #yExhaust (including #yImages) for the first time each turn, gain [E].

Elaina:LifePotion.NAME: Life Potion
Elaina:LifePotion.FLAVOR: Crafted by the genius witch, Elaina, it possesses incredible powers
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain a new power, draw cards until your hand size equals the number of powers (up to the maximum hand size).

Elaina:TreasureWine.NAME: Treasured Wine
Elaina:TreasureWine.FLAVOR: It seems one can glimpse its origin from the angry figure of a girl on the packaging
DESCRIPTIONS: When you lose #yConclusion, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of remaining Diary cards.

Elaina:GreedyDoll.NAME: Covetous Doll
Elaina:GreedyDoll.FLAVOR: A head of beautiful hair possesses a certain charm
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b4 turns, apply all cards in hand #yRetain.

Elaina:NicolesAdventure.NAME: Nicole's Adventures
Elaina:NicolesAdventure.FLAVOR: Because of this book, the beautiful witch embarked on a journey.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pWandering #pWitch. At the start of each combat, apply all cards in hand #yInstant and #yRecord them. Advance #yMonth by 2 when entering a combat room. Gain 5 max HP when completing a cycle.

Replaces #pWandering #pWitch. At the start of each combat, apply all cards in hand #yInstant and #yRecord them. Advance #yMonth by 2 when entering a combat room. Gain 5 max HP when completing a cycle. NL Current Season: #bWinter

Replaces #pWandering #pWitch. At the start of each combat, apply all cards in hand #yInstant and #yRecord them. Advance #yMonth by 2 when entering a combat room. Gain 5 max HP when completing a cycle. NL Current Season: #yAutumn

Elaina:ShinyMushroom.NAME: Shiny Mushroom
DESCRIPTIONS: When a card reward that can grant a temporary card is encountered, transform it into its corresponding temporary card and gain #b9 Gold.
